thread.title: Welcome to Spain's Most Beautiful Beach
thread.title_full: Welcome to Spain's Most Beautiful Beach

title: Welcome to Spain's Most Beautiful Beach
text:
> Travel Welcome to Spain's Most Beautiful Beach Spain's more than 5,000 miles of coastline attracts many Europeans every summer, but for 2015 there is only one beach that is most beautiful according to the Spanish. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
